channel.title: Cybersecurity on orioninsist
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on orioninsist

item.title: Common Cyber Attack Types: Phishing, Malware, and DDoS
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Learn about the most common types of cyber attacks. This beginner's guide explains what Phishing, Malware, and DDoS attacks are and how to protect yourself from them.

item.title: Cybersecurity Basics Cia Triad
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: This article explains the core principles of the CIA Triad—Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability—and their importance in information security. A perfect guide for beginners.

item.title: Exploring Cybersecurity with Python: Advanced Topics and Practical Examples
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Dive into advanced cybersecurity topics with Python, learn practical examples, and enhance your skills. #cybersecurity #python

item.title: Developing Cybersecurity Applications using Python Libraries: An Introduction
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Learn about essential Python libraries for cybersecurity applications and explore buffer overflow vulnerabilities. Stay tuned for more.

item.title: Python-based Random Password Generator Released
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Exciting news! Python-based Random Password Generator released. Enhance your security.

item.title: Generating Random Passwords in Python
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: Learn to generate secure passwords in Python. Enhance application security with this code snippet.
